One day, a young girl named Lily visits the spider's web and accidentally gets trapped in it. The spider, feeling guilty, decides to help Lily and weaves her a beautiful golden dress.
The villagers are amazed by the dress and they start to visit the spider's web to see the spider and its beautiful web.
The spider, feeling happy and loved, decides to weave more beautiful webs and dresses for the villagers.
One day, a greedy king hears about the spider and its beautiful web and decides to capture the spider and its web for himself.
The spider, feeling threatened, decides to flee and takes the villagers with her.
